title: Toddlers Behaving (Very) Badly
overview: Childcare expert and private nanny Laura Amies is travelling up and down the country to help tame the UK's toddlers and empower their stressed out parents.The series sees Laura use her unique no-nonsense approach to parenting to help desperate families battling today's challenges â€“ from screen addiction to too much sugar, from biting to terrible tantrums. With an ethos that no toddler is truly naughty and all Mums and Dads can learn to be good parents, Laura's warm and witty approach to dealing with both parents and their offspring is as refreshing as it is brutally honest.Each episode features three different families experiencing behavioural issues with their toddlers. Laura meets the children and the parents, observes their behaviour and identifies the underlying issues. She then teaches and implements her simple techniques to help transform the behaviour in an instant leaving the families with the tools to transform their household.
